Name: 迷禁 Lost in Abyss
About the game: ABOUT THE GAME You are Landon — trapped in a twisted and terrifying dream, wondering a mysterious old house. Warm memories and terrible realities are intertwined and tragedy unfolds as you explore, find clues and solve puzzles in this long-forgotten nightmare. MAIN FEATURES ◼ A rich environment with atmospheric music and SFX for horror immersion ◼ Puzzles and hidden clues with moderate difficulty ◼ Terrifying animations and events; including some gore ◼ High-quality Chinese VO for an authentic Chinese horror experience ◼ Fully localised subtitles, UI and voiceovers STORY FEATURE Delve deep into your own inner world, confront the horrible truth about the tragic deaths of Lilith and her family. Your goal is to uncover a hidden conspiracy; the blood and sin that’s fuelled the success of an infamous cult known as Saint Cohen. A cruel sacrifice awaits you; the chains of flesh are foretelling your fate. With no way out, do you accept the fate or fight against it? VR FEATURES ◼ Supports HTC VIVE, Oculus Quest, Valve Index ◼ Improved VR movement with six degrees of freedom (6DOF) ◼ Full locomotion with snap-turning rotation ◼ Packed with interactive items; pick up, discard, knock or destroy
